setting.name: InstallerServeDNS
setting.description: To turn DNS On/Off on the installer node.

setting.name: InstallerServeNIS
setting.description: To turn NIS On/Off on the installer node.

setting.name: InstallerServeNTP
setting.description: To turn NTP On/Off on the installer node.

setting.name: InstallerServeNFS
setting.description: To turn NFS On/Off on the installer node.

setting.name: DNSZone
setting.description: The DNS zone for the cluster.
setting.allowed_values: Must be a valid Domain name for all nodes in the cluster.

setting.name: PublicDNSZone
setting.description: The DNS zone of the public network that the installer belongs to.
setting.allowed_values: Must be a valid domain name for the external public network.

setting.name: PrimaryInstallerName
setting.description: Name of the primary installer node.
setting.allowed_values: Must be a valid hostname for the primary installer node.

setting.name: PrimaryDNS
setting.description: Name of the primary Domain Name Server.
setting.allowed_values: Must be a valid IP address.

setting.name: RHNInstallationNumber
setting.description: License/Subscription Number for Red Hat Network.
setting.allowed_values: Must be a valid RHN Installation Number.

setting.name: SyslogServer
setting.description: IP or hostname of the remote syslog server.
setting.allowed_values: Must be a valid IP address or hostname.
